item.title: kathleen add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: kathleen add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Weeds are flowers, too, once you get to know them." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "You know, it's hard work to write a book. I can't tell you how many times I really get going on an idea, then my quill breaks. Or I spill ink all over my writing tunic." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Judith Viorst
item.description: "Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces." -- Judith Viorst

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: kathleen add a quote by George Sand
item.description: "Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness." -- George Sand

item.title: kathleen add a quote by André Breton
item.description: "My wish is that you may be loved to the point of madness." -- André Breton

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Richard Wilbur
item.description: "What is the opposite of two? A lonely me, a lonely you." -- Richard Wilbur

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "I have never listened to anyone who criticized my taste in space travel, sideshows or gorillas. When this occurs, I pack up my dinosaurs and leave the room." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: kathleen add a quote by William Ernest Henley
item.description: "It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul." -- William Ernest Henley

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Everybody hates me because I'm so universally liked." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "It isn't by getting out of the world that we become enlightened, but by getting into the world…by getting so tuned in that we can ride the waves of our existence and never get tossed because we become the waves." -- Ken Kesey

item.title: kathleen add a quote by Jonas Salk
item.description: "There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality." -- Jonas Salk
